PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05992019-05-31TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Transport Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Commercial Vehicle Drivers Hours of Service Regulations (Electronic Logging Devices and Other Amendments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the COMMERCIAL VEHICLE DRIVERS HOURS OF SERVICE REGULATIONS (ELECTRONIC LOGGING DEVICES AND OTHER AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) improve commercial vehicle safety, administrative efficiency and compliance with Hours of Service regulations and to facilitate fair competition, by requiring the use of Electronic Logging Devices by motor carriers and their commercial bus and truck drivers; and (2) address issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0165 Publication Date: 2019-06-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Commercial Vehicle Drivers Hours of Service Regulations (Electronic Logging Devices and Other Amendments)
precis: Regulations Amending the COMMERCIAL VEHICLE DRIVERS HOURS OF SERVICE REGULATIONS (ELECTRONIC LOGGING DEVICES AND OTHER AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) improve commercial vehicle safety, administrative efficiency and compliance with Hours of Service regulations and to facilitate fair competition, by requiring the use of Electronic Logging Devices by motor carriers and their commercial bus and truck drivers; and (2) address issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
